product_name: Eagle Creek Roz Courier Bag - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Roz Courier bag from Eagle Creek is a handy travel companion. This slender cross-body shoulder bag carries your 10 in. laptop and has great interior organization. Roomy main zip compartment; separate-access padded zip compartment is sized to fit most e-readers, netbooks or iPads. Enjoy quick access to items in the front exterior zip pocket and back slip pocket. Top flap secures with a magnetic closure; interior features organizer pockets for mobile phone, electronics, pens and other necessities. Secure-zip toggle closure provides extra security for main and tablet pockets. Adjustable 50 in. shoulder strap can be worn over the shoulder or across the body. Roz is made from a tough, yet durable recycled polyester. Metal findings and satin lining dress up the Eagle Creek Roz bag. Reflective highlights improve nighttime visibility. Closeout.
short_description: The Roz Courier bag from Eagle Creek is a handy travel companion. This slender cross-body shoulder bag carries your 10 in. laptop and has great interior organization.
